definition: dark nebula (visible as a shadow, absorbing light from behind)/absorption nebula
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Stars are forming within the dark cloud.
sentences.chinese: 恆星正在該暗星雲中形成。

sentences.english: The major use of this spectrograph is to observe the CO molecular spectral lines from dark clouds in the Galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 主要用於南天暗星雲中一氧化碳分子譜線的觀測研究。

sentences.english: Many of Barnard's dark nebulae are themselves likely sites of future star formation.
sentences.chinese: 許多巴納德暗星雲本身可能就是未來恆星誕生的地點。

sentences.english: The investigation of dark nebulas has been facilitated by a new discovery .
sentences.chinese: 對暗星雲的研究被一種新發現所推進。
